projects.title: Spintos laboratorija
projects.content: Spintos laboratorija was my first project. It was supposed to be a frontend side of a mock fashion magazine/shop.

projects.title: This portfolio
projects.content: I made this portfolio to look cartoonish and interactive because I wanted to show my react skills and personality.

projects.title: Autocomplete input
projects.content: This was a homework assignment for WCC Academy courses. It's purpose was to create autocompletion banner for a movie search.
